Title: Episode #1.4
Writer: Joe Penhall (created by), John Douglas (based upon the book by), Mark Olshaker (based upon the book by), Joe Penhall (teleplay by), Dominic Orlando (teleplay by), Joe Penhall (story by)

Plot: Bill and Holden consult with Dr Wendy Carr to begin classifying their subjects and they receive surprising news.
